Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, princess. So you came to see me,
huh? You really are cute.
<PAGE>
...Your timing is perfect. There's
something I want to talk to you about.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Let's see... It'd be easier to talk
about this somewhere else. Come on,
follow me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're a wonderful woman. You're cute,
kind, and honest, and you've even got
guts.
<PAGE>
You're the ideal partner. I'd even say
that you're worthy of me.
<PAGE>
...That's why I don't want to ever let
you go, and I never will.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whatcha say, <MYNAME>? Will you be my
wife? I guarantee that you won't regret
it.
Marry him
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...That's a good response, princess.
Well, you're helplessly in love with me,
so I knew there was no way you'd refuse.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, my princess. I'll make you
the happiest woman in the world.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I need to tell the fellas in the town
that we're getting married. Let's go,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is wonderful! Allen, it's up to you
to make <MYNAME> happy!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on, who do you think you're talking
to? Instead of worrying about me, you
should worry about yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the way, Dunhill, can I ask you to
officiate at the wedding ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can prepare the wedding venue for you.
I may not look the part, but I've
actually got a good sense of style.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I can also prepare the clothes for the
wedding. I'll let Allen know when they
arrive.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, that works. Dunhill, Rod, I'm
counting on you two.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
On <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>, <MYNAME> will truly be
mine... You're looking forward to
it, right princess?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...Yeah, that makes sense. I just
sprung this on you today, so I'll give
you some time to think about it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So that's what I wanted to talk to you
about. Shall we go back now, princess?
Here, I'll walk you home.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! Did you come to see me? I'm
really happy you're here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Well, um, are you free right now?
There's something I want to talk to you
about.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Umm... This place doesn't really have
the atmosphere I'm looking for. Follow
me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Umm... It feels good to be up in the
mountains, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
Do you remember when we came up here for
a picnic? I already liked you then.
<PAGE>
I liked you so much I could hardly stand
it. After we started going out, my
feelings changed to love.
<PAGE>
And I'm confident now that I'll keep on
loving you forever. So I want to propose
to you right now, in this spot.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll devote my life to making you happy,
<MYNAME>. So will you marry me?
Marry him
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm very happy <MYNAME>. I'm truly
grateful that you've chosen me as your
husband.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... I love you more than anyone
else in the whole wide world.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now let's go tell the townspeople that
we're gonna get married!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Rod. You don't find a
good woman like <MYNAME> very often. Try
not to lose her, okay little buddy?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I won't. After we're married,
we'll hold hands together every night
in bed. Thanks for your blessings.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the way, Dunhill, I want to have a
wedding in the town. Could you marry us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I can! <MYNAME> has done so much
for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll prepare the wedding venue. You can
leave it all to me. Expect a great
wedding with someone like me in charge.
<PAGE>
I'll also take care of the clothes that
you two will wear at the ceremony.
After they arrive, I'll give 'em to Rod.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If it's fine with <MYNAME>, it's fine with
me. Thanks, you two. I'm counting on
both of you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I can't wait for <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>. I know
you'll look stunning in your wedding
dress.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, okay. I guess it's not something
that you can decide so easily. I'm
sorry for bringing this up so suddenly.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
But I'm serious about this... Please
think about it. Come on, I'll walk you
home.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. It's good to see you.
I've been waiting for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I have something very important to talk
to you about. Come with me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you enjoy being with me? I
love being with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm flippant, sneaky, and sloppy, but
you still accept me for who I am.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you're very precious and dear to
me, and I always want to have you by my
side.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're the only one for me, <MYNAME>.
That's why I'm asking you to marry me
and make me a happy man.
Marry him
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You'll marry me? You've just made me
very happy! Thank you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll do my best to make you happy too,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It really is true that everyone has
someone who they're destined to be with.
I'm so grateful that I met you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, my little <MYNAME>, shall we go let
everyone know that we're getting
married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>When we tell everyone, what will their
faces look like? When I think about our
age difference, I have mixed feelings.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're getting married, aye? It's great
that your love brought you together
despite your ages. Congratulations!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is wonderful. Soseki, <MYNAME>,
congratulations on your marriage.
<PAGE>
Soseki, you're much older than her, so
make sure to focus on being a reliable
husband from now on.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, you two. I'll work hard to make
sure that little <MYNAME> doesn't ask for
a divorce!
<PAGE>
By the way, Dunhill, if it's not too
much trouble, can I ask you to officiate
at the ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll prepare the wedding venue. I'll
make sure that you two have a wedding
you can be proud of.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's good for me too. I appreciate
this, you two. I'm counting on both of
you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, we'll only be boyfriend and
girlfriend for a little longer, but
let's enjoy that too while it lasts.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see. I guess I brought this up too
soon. It looks like I was rushing into
things.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have to give me an answer
right away. Take some time to think
about it. For now, let's head back.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A pleasant day to you, <MYNAME>. Thank
you for coming. I've been waiting for
you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There's something that I'd like to talk
to you about today, <MYNAME>. Let's go to
the mountains for a little while.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I want to thank you for all the
happiness you've brought me.
<PAGE>
Up until now, the purpose of my life has
been to serve my country, and I was
content with that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But now, <MYNAME>, you've given my life an
additional purpose: to be with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I don't want to lose someone who I care
so much about. Would you do me the honor
of taking my hand in marriage?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love you more than anyone else in the
world. Please be my wife, and my refuge.
Marry him
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you very much, <MYNAME>. You have
made me the happiest person on earth.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
From now on, I'll always be by your
side, <MYNAME>. Let's live our lives
together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we go announce our intent to
marry? Please take my hand, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Sanjay. <MYNAME>, please
take good care of Sanjay.
<PAGE>
I've known Sanjay for a long time, and
he's like a member of my family. I
couldn't be happier for him.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. Amir, Dunhill, I'm
grateful for your words of
encouragement.
<PAGE>
Dunhill, may I ask you to officiate at
the wedding?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me prepare the wedding venue. Oh,
and you'll be needing some attire.
Please allow me to handle that as well.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, that's fine with me as well. I am
truly grateful for the support you two
are offering me. I know I can trust you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it looks like we're going to
have a delightful ceremony. I'm already
looking forward to it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...I'm sorry for forcing my feelings
on you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Feel free to give me an answer whenever
you like. Please take your time to think
things over.
<PAGE>
That's everything I had to say. Now
<MYNAME>, please allow me to walk you
home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>... You came to see me. You're
just the person I wanted to see.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...There's something I want to ask you.
Come with me for a bit.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Um, <MYNAME>... Wh-What do you
think about marriage?
<PAGE>
We've been going out for a while, right?
We should really make our intentions
clear, don't you think?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm not talking about trying to control
you. It's just that I've been thinking
that I want to start a family with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you want to be with me even a
fraction as much as I want to be with
you... why don't we get married?
Marry him
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Thanks for accepting my proposal,
<MYNAME>. From now on, let's share
our lives with each other.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You better listen up. I'm only going to
say this once... I love you more than
anyone else in the world.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go, <MYNAME>. If we're gonna have a
wedding, we'll need the townspeople to
help us out.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Neil... It's so good to see you happy.
Remember to appreciate your family.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You two have known each other longer
than most young couples nowadays. You
share a deep connection with each other.
<PAGE>
I'm sure the two of you will make a
wonderful family. Good luck.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, please keep watching over us from
here on out, will ya.
<PAGE>
Oh yeah, Dunhill, can I ask you to marry
us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course. You and <MYNAME> have done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please let me handle the wedding venue.
Oh, and you two will be needing wedding
attire as well.
<PAGE>
It's been awhile since we had a
wedding. This is so exciting! You two
can count on me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, that's good. I want to give this
girl a nice wedding. I'm counting on you
two.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, the wedding's not far away. Be
careful not to get hurt. You're the star
of this wedding after all.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Okay. Sorry for putting you on the spot
like that. But you're not saying that
you don't want to marry me, right?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can wait. Think it over a while, will
ya.
<PAGE>
Well, that's all I had to say. Let's go
back, <MYNAME>. I'll walk you home.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Thanks for coming. You're
just the person I wanted to see.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I actually have something that I want
to tell you. It'd be difficult to talk
here, so let's head to the mountains.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I sent a letter to my parents recently
to ask their permission for something.
Now that I have it, I want to tell you.
<PAGE>
Well... <MYNAME>, will you be my wife?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm asking you to please trust me when I
say that I will always love you and be
by your side supporting you.
<PAGE>
No one else will do. You're the person
who I most want to make happy. So
please, will you marry me?
Marry him
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Really? Thank you, <MYNAME>. You've made
me very happy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
This feeling must be what they call
love. <MYNAME>, I'll always treat you
right.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well <MYNAME>, let's go announce that
we're getting married. I'll also need to
write a letter to my parents.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you're getting married! I see.
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
I'm sure you and Amir will be happy
together, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Master Amir, Miss <MYNAME>,
congratulations.
<PAGE>
It's truly wonderful that Master Amir
is getting married to someone who he
loves from the bottom of his heart.
<PAGE>
Miss <MYNAME>, words cannot express my
gratitude to you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, you two. I really appreciate
your words of congratulations.
<PAGE>
By the way, Dunhill, I want to get
married in this town, may I ask you to
officiate at the wedding?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll handle the preparations for the
ceremony's venue. I'll also prepare
the wedding attire.
<PAGE>
We'll use our home country's special
royal wedding clothes.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's fine. Thank you so much, you two.
There's not much time until the wedding,
but I know I can count on you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm very excited about our wedding,
<MYNAME>. I haven't been this excited
since I first came to this town.
<PAGE>
We'll probably be very busy with
preparations, but let's work together
and do our best.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see... I know this was too sudden...
I'm sorry.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can wait for as long as you need to
make up your mind. Please take your time
to think about it.
<PAGE>
Well, let's head back, <MYNAME>. I'll walk
you home.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome, <MYNAME>! I've been waiting for
you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
There's something I want to tell you.
It's not easy to say here, so can we go
somewhere else? Follow me.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First let me say thank you, <MYNAME>.
Thanks to you, every day is fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But recently I've been thinking that
having fun together isn't enough...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I like you, <MYNAME>. So I want to share
the good times, the bad times, and
everything else with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Umm, <MYNAME>, I want to be a part of your
life. Would you please make me your
wife?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You know how I am, I can't just wait for
you to propose to me.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, if you want to be with me even
just a little bit... let's get married.
Marry her
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. From now on I'll
always be by your side doing whatever I
can to make you happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. I always have, and I
always will.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, I know I just proposed, but
let's go announce our marriage! I'm sure
everyone will be excited.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Tina a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Tina! Getting married
to <MYNAME>, huh?! I'm so jealous.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I want you to make Tina
happier than anyone else in the world!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, you two. I'm so happy.
<PAGE>
Oh yeah, Dunhill, we want to have a
wedding of course. Can I ask you to
officiate the ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take care of the wedding venue.
I'll have Clement make something extra
delicious!
<PAGE>
I'll also prepare the wedding clothes.
I'll get in touch with Tina when they
arrive.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just
about right. Is that fine?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That sounds good to me! I'm sure you two
will do a fantastic job!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A wedding! And then we'll be living
together as a couple! I can't wait,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see. I understand. I shouldn't have
proposed to you out of the blue. I'm
sorry for rushing things.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But these feelings are real. Think about
it, okay?
<PAGE>
Well, that's all I wanted to say. Let's
head back, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hi <MYNAME>. Did you come to see me?!
I hope you brought a gift with you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh yeah, I want to ask you for a favor,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I don't want to talk about it here, so
let's go somewhere else.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To tell you the truth, one of my fans
proposed to me recently... And he was
pretty persistent about it too.
<PAGE>
I told him that I'm seeing someone, but
he wouldn't listen at all! It was a very
difficult situation for me.
<PAGE>
So, <MYNAME>, I want you to propose to me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Once my fans know I'm married, they'll
stop being so aggressive, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Remember, this is a request from your
super-cute girlfriend.
<PAGE>
How could you let things go this far
without proposing to me, <MYNAME>? You're
not that kind of man, are you?
Propose to her
Hold off on it for now

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
He he he. That's right. Well done!
<PAGE>
If you really want to marry me that
much, I suppose I'll let you!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Make me the happiest wife in the world,
okay? I won't stand for anything less.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now let's go tell everyone we're getting
married! We need to ask them to help us
with the ceremony, after all!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Tee-hee! I wonder what kinds of
wedding gifts we'll get! I can't
wait to find out!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Michelle a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Congratulations, Michelle... You
look really happy... I'm happy too.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, you two. I'm so happy that I
can't stop smiling!
<PAGE>
I suppose I should actually be grateful
to <MYNAME> for proposing to me.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>By the way, Dunhill, can I ask you to
officiate at the wedding? I don't know
who else to turn to...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
